import React from 'react' export default class PerformSaleComponent extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props) this.state = { itemType: '', brand: '', itemModel: '', processor: '', ramSize: '', hddSize: '', quantity: '', unitPrice: '', generation: '', cart: [] } } handleChangeLaptop = (evt)=> { const value = evt.target.value; const name = evt.target.name; this.setState({ ...this.state, [name]: value, }); return
